definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: They were produced by a French company, Thales, and the model was known as AA.
sentences.chinese: 這些皮托管由法國的泰勒斯公司生產，型號爲AA。

sentences.english: Until heaters can melt the ice, the pitot probes are out.
sentences.chinese: 除非用加熱器將冰融化，否則皮托管的探針就會失效。

sentences.english: Twenty-four hours later, their business was put into receivership.
sentences.chinese: 24小時之後，他們的生意被納入托管。

sentences.english: Until heaters can melt the ice, the pitot probes are out.
sentences.chinese: 如果有熱源將冰融化，皮托管也隨之熔解。

sentences.english: The pitot-static tube can be used only in free air.
sentences.chinese: 皮托管僅能用在自由流中。

definition: to administer/to manage/to hold in trust or escrow
to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
to receive sth on another's behalf
